snippet: Doctors Without Borders issued a statement accusing international peacekeeping officials of ignoring squalid conditions at a camp for displaced people in the capital, Juba.
abstract: Doctors Without Borders severely criticizes United Nations peacekeeping operation in South Sudan over what it calls a shameful indifference to the squalid living conditions of 21,000 displaced people.
lead_paragraph: Doctors Without Borders issued a statement accusing international peacekeeping officials of ignoring squalid conditions at a camp for displaced people in the capital, Juba.

headline.main: U.N. Ignores South Sudan Camp Crisis, Charity Says
headline.print_headline: U.N. Ignores South Sudan Camp Crisis, Charity Says

keywords.value: United Nations Department of Peacekeeping Operations
